## RecursivePartial type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RecursivePartial<T> = {
    [P in keyof T]?: T[P] extends (infer U)[] ? RecursivePartial<U>[] : T[P] extends Record<string, unknown> | undefined ? RecursivePartial<T[P]> : T[P];
};
```
